website_summaries.verdict: This large and crystal-clear display includes a wide range of connectivity, visual, and ergonomic options, making it a must-have for serious multitaskers.
pros: Fast refresh rate is great for gaming
Integrated speakers have a deep bass sound
cons: Does not work well with Apple computers

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor BUT...........
customer_reviews.text: I love the monitor. It big and has a lot of room to work with BUT IT NOT FREESYNC monitor. I am very disappointed in that. I am debating whether I should return it or not. Overall this is a pretty good monitors for someone that only do video editing and music editing. I would not recommend this for gamer.
customer_reviews.author: AinX

customer_reviews.title: Good business monitor
customer_reviews.text: I am not a gamer, so no comment on that. Mainly this is a monitor stripped off the extra features to save the cost. Things were taken away: 1. Speakers 2. Type-C connection 3. USB hub If you do not need the above, go for it. Another minor thing, the windows 10 driver shows it is a generic monitor, not true monitor name / model. Compared to the 34" ViewSonic XG, the weak-up time is much faster, the control system is better. I use this one to pair with the Dell U3011, like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor but best refresh rate is 60 Hertz, not 75 Hertz
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice monitor and graphic is superb. However, the description for the monitor is incorrect. The max refresh rate is 60 Hertz, not 75 Hertz as advertised. I picked this one over the dells' just because the spec says it is 75 Hertz. Also, the user CD comes with the product has virus which infected my PC. Buyer should be aware of that!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after my LG widescreen monitor died after 2 years...yes, I probably could have fixed it, but with my job I could not afford to go a while without a widescreen monitor so I took the plunge and just got a new one. This one has a little higher pixel count, and it shows. It's a gorgeous crisp screen, and I love it! The colors pop, and despite staring at the screen 8 plus hours a day, no eye strain due to the detailed picture it produces.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Wow the display is so nice, sharpness is very close compared to the 4k samsung monitor that I had. The curved screen is mind blowing. I do not use display to game as I have a seperate PC computer for that. Hooked this up to Mac pro 2013 using dp port to mini display port I got max resolution at 60Hz. Very please with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vinh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality screen with tons of real estate
customer_reviews.text: This is my second LG monitor and I'm in love with the quality and value of this monitor. Great work (instead of a dual-screen setup) and work well for casual gaming, definitely an upgrade from my Dell Ultrasharp 27". My only gripe is that the Dell monitor seems to have a better anti-glare film (more smooth with less freckly effect) but on the LG it's a bit noticeable at a close viewing distance.
customer_reviews.author: Morsy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful 38 monitor
customer_reviews.text: So much real-estate for productivity and colors are great too. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: JNMA

customer_reviews.title: In case no one mentioned it, HDMI 2 gives 60 Hz refresh rate, HDMI 1 only at 30
customer_reviews.text: wish LG had this clearly listed somewhere. knock 1 star off for that.
customer_reviews.author: xtal

customer_reviews.title: All is well, wait, wut?!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this monitor, gorgeous color, great size. However, one day, I found out the backlight leaking, now I cannot ignore it. I will return this monitor, and hopefully this is just an isolated incidence.
customer_reviews.author: Puffing

customer_reviews.title: 38 Curve or 2 flat monitors
customer_reviews.text: Before i bought this 38inch curve, thought about buying 2 flat monitors. But after i got this i really liked. I felt so great. Very easy installation. The only regret is it did not speakers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful screen
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for work. I was debating for a long time whether to switch to one large screen or keep using several. I decided to give this a try and I couldn't be happier. I ended up keeping my side screens as well, but this an exellent central screen and definitely increases the comfort of my work. The size is just right to see most of it without turning the head too much and sharpness is excellent, big difference comparing to the other 4k screen that I use next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: NOT 75 HZ.
customer_reviews.text: Although the description states it can go to 75 HZ, 60HZ is as high as it goes. Very disappointing and misleading information. I'm not sure why LG would not fix this error in the product description. It may have swayed my decision and for the cost of this panel, 75 HZ should be the minimum. Yes 60 to 75 is not the end of the world, but its more about the concept behind the misleading info for such an expensive item. Frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: amazing (and big)
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is the perfect combination of resolution, aspect ratio, color reproduction, etc. Yes, this monitor is worth every $ you spend on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron G

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Come With a DisplayPort Cable
customer_reviews.text: This $900 monitor did not come with a DisplayPort cable which is required for 3840x1600 resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Sporadic

customer_reviews.title: WTF !!!!! Not happy at all! Returned for full refund!
customer_reviews.text: WTF !!!!! Not happy at all! Returned for full refund!
customer_reviews.author: James Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Generous size monitor and resolution.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. The 38" is perfect size for the 3840x1600 resolution. Easily fit three windows side by side. Great for office work and way better than multiple monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Hubbert

product_meta.title: LG 38WN75C-B 38-Inch Class 21:9 Curved UltraWide QHD+ (3840 x 1600) IPS Display with HDR 10 and Tilt/Height Adjustable Stand, Black
product_meta.description: Wide, curved and picture perfect. Immerse yourself in work and play with the #1 UltraWide Monitor brand in the U.S. At 38" and 21:9 screen ratio, this Wide QHD IPS Display features realistic, accurate color, contrast, clarity and detail in a curved design for a greater field of view. Content creation. Designing. Video editing. Gaming. Whatever the task, our LG UltraWide Monitor delivers picturesque panoramas and high-performance features.
feature_bullets: 38" Curved UltraWide QHD+ (3840 x 1600) IPS Display
sRGB 99% Color Gamut / HDR10 Compatible / Color Calibrated
Easy Multi-tasking with Screen Split and On-Screen Control

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars22 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
